name: The Limbo Run
description:
Sport is all about going deep. But there is no sport, where you have to go as deep as in the 100 Meter Limbo Run.

Controls

Quickly click on the Space Bar to go low enough to go under the obstacles. But be aware the lower you go the slower you run. And if you go too low, you will fall. (See the Balance Meter)

In the "skip dialog"-version of the game, you can skip the intro dialog with Enter Key.

Good luck and have fun
